review: This place can give you a satisfying feeling, good for families who want to have a relaxation, bonding each other. Nature loving place and also it has basketball court for those who wants to play ball games, swimming pool for kids and adults

It was really nice in this place. Good customer service. Service staff are approachable. Very clean room and comfort room. Water is running very very good. Towels and linens are as good as new. I won't waste hesitate to give them 5 star. If i will return soon in camiguin I'll surely come back to this place.
(Translated by Google) The place is nice, it's nice to come back, there's a free pool.(Original) Nice ang place sarap balikan may libre pang pool
